name: BSDFortune
0:
”Alexa, ask b. s. d. fortune to read to me”
”Tell me a fortune”
”Alexa, ask b. s. d. fortune for a random fortune”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. s. d. fortune
des: Ask Alexa for a random fortune. This skill picks a random fortune or quote from the BSD fortune files and reads it back to you. The BSD fortunes, and the program that displayed them, were originally collected and written by Ken Arnold for the Berkeley(BSD) distribution of Unix.
